New Records: The Kings have now won 6 straight games
Key Match Events: Devin Carter led his team on an 8-2 run in the 4th quarter
Domantas Sabonis finished with 23 points and 28 rebounds
Keegan Murray had a fantastic game, going 5-of-8 from three and finishing with 19 points, 3 rebounds, 3 blocks, and 2 steals
Pre-Game Insights: Doug Christie instills confidence in his players
Keegan Murray mentioned that Doug Christie's coaching style is key to the team's recent success
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Doug Christie mentioned that getting Domantas Sabonis to stop complaining to the refs as much was a key factor in the win
The team is now back to.500 for the season and has won 6 straight games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Kings have moved up to the 9th seed in the standings
The team is 3.5 games back from the 4th seed
The Kings will face the Chicago Bulls on Sunday
